Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 51st overall pick, by Malibu in 1970...
Injured on 5/15/1970 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/22/1974 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1979, off Sam Barnes (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/1980, off Chad Johnson (PG)...
Earned first career win on 8/18/1980...
Injured on 4/25/1982 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 8-9 weeks...
Traded from Malibu to Bay City on 2/5/1983 (Going to BC: P R. Higa, 1B H. Yan, 2B J. Pinney. Going to Mal: 2B C. Few, C R. Ambriz)...
Injured on 5/18/1983 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 3/1/1985 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/8/1987 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
